REGISTER.TITLE: Registrovat se
REGISTER.TESTIMONIAL_HEADER: All it takes is one step to move forward
REGISTER.TESTIMONIAL_CONTENT: You're one step away from engaging your customers, retaining them and finding new ones.

COMPANY_NAME.LABEL: Company name

FULL_NAME.LABEL: Celé jméno

EMAIL.LABEL: Pracovní e-mail
EMAIL.PLACEHOLDER: Enter your work email address. E.g., bruce@wayne.enterprises
EMAIL.ERROR: Please enter a valid work email address.

PASSWORD.LABEL: Heslo
PASSWORD.IS_INVALID_PASSWORD: Heslo by mělo obsahovat alespoň jedno velké písmeno, jedno malé písmeno, jedno číslo a jeden speciální znak.
